meanings.definition: Arrange (a group of people or things) in categories according to shared qualities or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: I will classify the books by genre on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: Scientists classify animals based on their habitats and behaviors.
meanings.sent3: The librarian decided to classify the books by color instead of genre.
meanings.sent4: She could classify people like a human sorting machine.
meanings.sent5: In order to remember the information, I classify it into different mental folders.

meanings.definition: Categorize or label (someone or something) as belonging to a particular group.
meanings.sent1: Teachers classify students into different groups for the project.
meanings.sent2: The software will classify the emails as spam or important.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly classify my cat as the ruler of the house.
meanings.sent4: Her friends classify her as the most organized person they know.
meanings.sent5: To make it easier to find, I classify my clothes by color in the closet.
